Hi {!Opportunity.Contact_First_Name__c},
Thanks again for choosing to grow your business with BigCommerce! Here are the next steps for taking advantage of your special offers from our Grow Bundle with PayPal.
1. Pick out your premium template
Please take a look at our premium templates to find one you like. They’re all mobile friendly and have SEO built right in to help your search rankings. A BigCommerce store setup expert will help apply your choice.

2. Call us at 866-949-5339 to begin your store setup consultation
Our experts are ready to help you with:
Applying your premium template
Setting up PayPal for your payments and adjusting your checkout settings
Configuring shipping, taxes, SSL, domain and other settings
Stocking your products (options, SKUs, rules, categories)
Just call 866-949-5339 to get started.
If you’re currently migrating your online store to BigCommerce, we can still work on some setup items now and then finish up when your migration is complete. Please email migrations@bigcommerce.com with any questions you have about your migration.
3. Get one-on-one SEO coaching
Once you’re ready, please call our dedicated line at 866-949-5339 so our SEO coaches can walk you through how to:
Identify and choose keywords for optimal performance
Optimize your page titles and links
Harness the power of metadata to improve your click­through rate from search results
Drive traffic with quality content and images
4. Grow like crazy
After that, you’ll be all set to grow your business and turn online shoppers into loyal customers.
We’re looking forward to helping you get started on BigCommerce,
The BigCommerce Team
